com.xebialabs.overthere.cifs.telnet

Class CifsTelnetConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xebialabs.overthere.spi.BaseOverthereConnection
      • com.xebialabs.overthere.cifs.CifsConnection
        • com.xebialabs.overthere.cifs.telnet.CifsTelnetConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OverthereConnection, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class CifsTelnetConnection
extends CifsConnection
    A connection to a Windows host using CIFS and Telnet.

    Limitations:

    • Shares with names like C$ need to available for all drives accessed. In practice, this means that Administrator access is needed.
    • Windows Telnet Service must be configured to use stream mode:
      > tlntadmn config mode=stream
    • Not tested with domain accounts.
